Name: Perry Young
Description:
Young was killed at the same time as William Flood, an off-duty police officer. Ronald Haynes was sentenced for both murders after three mistrials.

http://www.nycpba.org/community/keep-cop-killers-in-jail/cop-killers-form/ lists the killer of Flood as Robert Smith, and states that Flood was from the Queens Patrol precinct and was "Shot off duty taking action during a robbery".

Source: New York Times

https://www.nytimes.com/1977/12/29/archives/third-man-being-sought-in-murder-of-policeman-and-harlem.html
